projectDescription: Developed an LSTM-based deep learning model for predicting market risk percentage using key financial metrics. Implemented robust data preprocessing, model training, and backtesting to ensure accuracy and reliability.

Designed a full-stack web platform for farmers to market and sell produce directly, eliminating intermediaries. Integrated MongoDB for secure data storage and a TensorFlow-based image analysis model to detect crop diseases like rust and mildew.

Built a bare-metal OS kernel from scratch with a custom bootloader, interrupt handling (IDT & PIC), and a keyboard driver. Implemented memory segmentation using GDT and developed a basic command-line interface.
Developed a scalable microservices backend using Golang, RabbitMQ (AMQP protocol), gRPC, and REST APIs. Implemented authentication, logging, and event-driven communication with Dockerized deployment.
